dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.compet.intel.CompetitorIntelligence
dataStructure.description:
Facts gathered about a Competitor's plans and activities. These facts can be used to perform Competitor SWOT analysis in order to better understand a Competitor.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CompetitorIntelligence

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for the CompetitorIntelligence.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that describes the CompetitorIntelligence.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period during which the CompetitorIntelligence is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor
